metadata.title: CVE-2017-11114 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The put_chars function in html_r.c in Twibright Links 2.14 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via a crafted HTML file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-11114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

links - 2.14-3
links2 - 2.14-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: links2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.14-3').
